The viral TikTok video showing the claim: s drink sizes sparked a debate on the internet in November 2020.
The small: medium, and large cup sizes at McDonald's do not hold the same amount of liquid, contrary to the claim.
The prank of pre: filling the medium and large cups with liquid to deceive viewers has been used before, as seen in a similar video posted by YouTube user Dustin Quinn in May.
In a 2016 video by the: As Seen on Social Media" YouTube page, the inside of the cup was shown, and the liquid was transferred back and forth to demonstrate that there was no trickery involved, confirming that the small, medium, and large drink sizes at McDonald's are indeed different sizes.
